2_18cSYDgTfMB255SDgQM9EuoyWu78MhWfNj.body:
I do not know if there is better free solution for KVM & LXC virtualization than Proxmox.
I tried it and it is good, though to setup public facing networking on the node was very hard for me as a noob.

5_16ruLucRLto6GhT1Zb3P8JVZzC48fxd9Cc.body: Another interesting app that does similar (preventing OS to send data to Microsoft) is https://www.winprivacy.de/english-home/

1_16ruLucRLto6GhT1Zb3P8JVZzC48fxd9Cc.body: I tried it, but it had alot of bugs back in early 2017, but is very interesting and unique project, because it allows anonymous torrent seeding. I will try it again later, currently i am using VPN and https://qBittorrent.org
